meanings.definition: To smile or grin in a mocking or contemptuous manner.
meanings.sent1: She was fleering at him during the entire presentation.
meanings.sent2: The bully was fleering at the smaller kids on the playground.
meanings.sent3: His fleering expression made everyone laugh at the silly joke.
meanings.sent4: The cat sat on the windowsill, fleering at the birds outside.
meanings.sent5: The villain's fleering face revealed his true intentions.

meanings.sent1: The teacher noticed the student's fleering when she caught him cheating.
meanings.sent2: Her fleering made it clear she was not impressed with the joke.
meanings.sent3: The painting of the jester captured his fleering expression perfectly.
